basics.name: Matthew Nestor
basics.label: Technical Communications Expert
basics.summary: Highly detail-oriented technical writer with experience in developing and implementing doc-as-code workflows for SaaS businesses. Skilled in creating comprehensive, user-friendly documentation that educates and empowers customers. Proven ability to integrate custom themes and maintain a seamless user experience across various Help Center/Knowledge Base platforms.

work.name: ClickFunnels
highlights: Collaborate across teams, including engineering, marketing, and ops to ensure timely updates and coverage of new features.
Lead efforts to restructure content for improved usability, accessibility, and efficiency.
Create and maintain a Help Center / Knowledge Base using a docs-as-code workflow from scratch.
Develop scripts, using Python and JavaScript, for detailed and accurate reporting, automation, testing, and publishing via API.
work.summary: ClickFunnels is a marketing/ecommerce SaaS company. I created, maintained, and improved the Help Center / Knowledge Base using a docs-as-code workflow from scratch.

work.name: Adna Technologies
highlights: Created and maintained detailed documentation and notes, improving efficiency and ensuring high-quality customer support.
Developed PowerShell scripts and custom tools, maintained with Git, to improve efficiency and automation.
work.summary: Adna Technologies is a MSP, fully managing local business's IT needs. I provided technical support for a wide range of software and technologies, adapting quickly to meet unique client requirements and find solutions.

work.name: Jurassic Quest
highlights: Set up, configure, and troubleshoot wireless networks, computers, and devices, ensuring smooth operation of life-size animatronics and attractions.
Build and maintain an educational trivia game with a Raspberry Pi using GPIO, Bash, Python, HTML / CSS, and JavaScript.
work.summary: Jurassic Quest is a travelling dinosaur exhibit, providing entertainment and education for children and people of all ages. I set up, repaired and replaced damaged electronics and equipment, ensuring a high-quality educational experience for attendees.

work.name: Burger King Corporation
work.summary: During my time here, I followed and enforced health and safety regulations. I was also responsible for tracking company cash, product, and employees. This role required me to delegate tasks and maintain overall efficiency. I also ensured accurate data entry into POS software.

references.name: Robert Paisley, Documentation Lead Analyst at ClickFunnels
references.reference: Matthew is constantly looking to improve himself and the team by learning and sharing skills that benefit us all.

references.name: Laura Demetrious, Communications Manager at ClickFunnels
references.reference: Matthew does a stellar job of staying on top of new functionalities that are otherwise complex for the average user.

projects.name: cf2-docs
highlights: Implemented and trained others to use a docs-as-code workflow.
